attributes.action: Demand an investigation into the running of great yarmouth outer harbour
attributes.additional_details: Our government & PSA  ( Port Of Singapore Authority )built a container terminal at The Port Of Great Yarmouth. All of the Yarmouth Dockers were dismissed after a long dispute. The terminal never handled 1 container before it was closed and most the equipment was exported to Italy. The terminal is now used for wind turbine construction but with hardly any local people working there.
